Is It Open Season For Crackers

02 Aug 1999

A number of sites have been announced as having been cracked within the last few days, some of which have been claimed by cracker groups, while some sites alleged that their attackers are governments.

Some choice picks are:

    \n
  • Symantec. Claimed to be by a cracker group upset at Norton stopping BackOrifice.\n
  • The US Army, allegedly by the cracker group who cracked the WhiteHouse not so long ago, as a 'we did it, honest' move.
  • US & UK based Falun Gong sites. Falun Gong is a meditation group banned by the Chinese government, and it's claimed that the Chinese govt were responsible for the cracking.
The latter crack excepted, it begs the question of revenge attacks by script kiddies in retaliation for the Kevin Mitnick case.
